a.info: We went to Universal Studios Florida over Thanksgiving break to celebrate birthdays!

b.info: Ewen and Fiona participated in some fun school activities, including Mathapalooza, Girl Scouts, and Turning Tigers (jump rope)

c.info: We visited Biltmore with cousin Cypress, enjoyed the Highland Games with Granddad, and baked cookies with Grandma and Pop-pop. Also: Angus!!!

e.info: Taekwondo! Ewen and Fiona earned their bodan belts (one away from black), and Tabitha earned her red belt.

f.info: Rock and Roll! David and Tabitha saw Elder and Tool in Charlotte, David saw Mastodon in Raleigh, and Tabitha and Fiona saw the Indigo Girls in Davidson.

g.info: We did some fun activities in the area, including Carowinds, the White Water Center, climbing walls, and a trip to the mountains.

h.info: Both kids played soccer with the Charlotte Independence in the Spring and Fall season, and David got to coach Fiona's team in the Spring.
